Text.Page:
Everyone loves to have a nice fish dish these days.
Getting the fish we catch into the hands of the consumer is the main way the Fishing Association–and it's member-anglers–makes money.
Go to Lake of Tears Fishery and you'll learn how!
Learned how to make and deliver a Fish Crate at the Lake of Tears Fishery.
Ready to go to the Lake of Tears Fishery?
Give my regards to Lushan at the Lake of Tears Fishery.

Fishing isn't just about earning money. It's about earning a whole bunch of money, doing something we love!
Sooner or later, everyone will appreciate the Fishing Association for what we do."I hope so."

You can always sell the fish you catch for money, but if you package them together in a Fish Crate, they'll stay fresh longer and command a higher price.
You can get the basic design from me in exchange for some Angler Tokens, so let's get you started on the path to fortune and glory...through fishing!

Well done! Now it's time to make your first delivery.
You can sell Fish Crates to Association Fishmongers at any Fishery or major city.

Like {@linkcreature:223#9905#Genn} over there. It looks like he's eager to talk to you!

Any Angler Token Vendor can sell you a Fish Crate design.
Why don't you try making one right now?

Hello! I saw you showing off a Fish Crate to Lushan over there. Would you be willing to sell it to me?
Since this is our first deal, I'll open a Special Delivery Shop just for you..

Thank you. I hope this isn't our last deal.

There's only so many orders I can fill a day, so be sure and deliver your most the most valuable items first.

Did you have a nice talk with Genn?

You probably noticed that the higher level Fish Crates command higher prices! As your skills in fishing and crafting increase, you'll want to learn to make all of them.
